iteration_goal: The initial architecture is designed with modularity in mind, comprising `data_loader`, `text_preprocessor`, and `logger_config` modules. `data_loader` handles loading Quran data, `text_preprocessor` performs basic text cleaning (diacritic removal, normalization), and `logger_config` sets up logging. A main script orchestrates these modules. This design supports incremental development and future scalability by clearly separating concerns and providing well-defined modules for each task.

The architecture will be updated by enhancing the `text_preprocessor` module with `arabic_normalization` and `tokenizer` sub-modules for improved Arabic text handling.  Normalization will address complete Arabic letter variations and Unicode artifacts. Tokenization will segment text into words. The `logger_config` will be updated to log these new preprocessing steps, improving observability. This modular design maintains separation of concerns and enhances system testability and maintainability.

The architecture is updated to include `lemmatizer` and `root_extractor` sub-modules within the `text_preprocessor` module. These additions will enable lemmatization and root word extraction for Arabic text using external libraries. The logging will be enhanced to capture lemmatized and root words. Integration tests will be updated to verify the correct implementation and log output of these new text processing stages, ensuring comprehensive analysis and observability.

Introduce a new `frequency_analyzer` module with a `count_word_frequencies` function to calculate word frequencies. Integrate this module into the `main` workflow after text preprocessing. Enhance logging to record frequency analysis results (unique word count and top frequent words). Update integration tests to verify the new functionality and logging. This modular design improves system organization and supports future extensions for advanced text analysis.

Introduce a new `cooccurrence_analyzer` module with `analyze_word_cooccurrence` function to perform word co-occurrence analysis. Integrate this module into the `main` workflow after word frequency analysis. Enhance logging to include co-occurrence analysis results and update integration tests to verify the new functionality and logging.

The `frequency_analyzer` module is extended to include `analyze_surah_word_frequency` and `analyze_ayah_word_frequency` functions for granular word frequency analysis. The `main` function will integrate these new functions, and logging will be updated to include their outputs. New integration tests will ensure the correctness of these enhancements, providing Surah and Ayah level insights.

Introduce a new `distribution_analyzer` module with `analyze_word_length_distribution` function to calculate and log word length distribution. The `main` function will call this new function after tokenization, and logs will be updated to include the analysis results. Integration tests will be enhanced to verify the new functionality. This modular approach maintains separation of concerns and supports future distribution analysis features.

The architecture is updated to extend the `frequency_analyzer` module with a new `analyze_root_word_frequency` function. This function will calculate and log the frequency of root words in the Quran. The `main()` function will be updated to include this analysis, and integration tests and logging will be enhanced to support the new functionality. This addition reuses the existing `frequency_analyzer` module, maintaining modularity and separation of concerns.

A new function `analyze_surah_root_word_frequency` is added to the `frequency_analyzer` module to perform root word frequency analysis at the Surah level. The `main` function is updated to include this new analysis, and integration tests are added for validation. This enhancement provides a more detailed view of root word distribution within each Surah of the Quran, building upon existing modules and functionalities.

A new function `analyze_ayah_root_word_frequency` is added to the `frequency_analyzer` module to calculate root word frequencies at the Ayah level. The `main()` function and logging are updated to incorporate this new analysis. Integration tests are enhanced to validate the new functionality, providing a more granular view of root word distribution within each Ayah.

Introduce `analyze_character_frequency` function within the `frequency_analyzer` module to perform character frequency analysis on the Quran text. Update `main()` to include this new analysis and enhance integration tests to validate its functionality and logging. This addition extends the `frequency_analyzer` module, maintaining modular design and ensuring testability.

Extend the `frequency_analyzer` module to include `analyze_surah_character_frequency` and `analyze_ayah_character_frequency` functions for character frequency analysis at Surah and Ayah levels. Update `main()` to incorporate these functions and add integration tests for validation. Enhance logging for clear output separation.

A new `ngram_analyzer` module is added to perform word N-gram frequency analysis. The module includes the `analyze_word_ngrams` function, which is called from `main()` to analyze the Quran text and log the frequency of word sequences. Integration tests are updated to validate this new functionality, enhancing the system's analytical capabilities in a modular and testable manner.

The `ngram_analyzer` module is extended to include `analyze_surah_word_ngrams` and `analyze_ayah_word_ngrams` functions for N-gram analysis at Surah and Ayah levels. The `main()` function and integration tests are updated to incorporate and validate these new functions, enhancing the granularity of word sequence analysis.

Extend the `ngram_analyzer` module to support character N-gram analysis by adding functions for Quran, Surah, and Ayah levels (`analyze_character_ngrams`, `analyze_surah_character_ngrams`, `analyze_ayah_character_ngrams`). Update `main()` to use these new functions and add integration tests for validation. Enhance logging to clearly present the results of each analysis level, including Surah and Ayah identifiers where applicable.

The `frequency_analyzer` module is extended with `analyze_ayah_first_root_word_frequency` and `analyze_ayah_last_root_word_frequency` functions to analyze the frequency of first and last root words in Ayahs. The `main()` function and integration tests are updated to include these new analyses, enhancing the system's analytical capabilities while maintaining modular design and testability. Logging is improved for clear output.

A new `collocation_analyzer` module is introduced to handle word collocation analysis. The `analyze_word_collocation` function is added to this module. `main.py` is updated to use this new module and function. Integration tests are enhanced to validate the collocation analysis. This modular design improves code organization and testability.

Introduce semantic group frequency analysis by adding `analyze_semantic_group_frequency` function to the `frequency_analyzer` module. This function will calculate and log the frequency of root words as semantic groups. Integrate this into `main()` and add integration tests to ensure correctness and proper logging.

A new `semantic_analyzer` module is created to house the `analyze_semantic_group_cooccurrence_ayah` function. The `main()` function is updated to use this new module for semantic group co-occurrence analysis at the Ayah level. Integration tests are added to validate the new functionality and logging. This enhances modularity and organization for semantic analysis features.

Introduce a new `anomaly_detector` module with `analyze_anomaly_detection` function to identify statistical deviations in Quranic text features. Integrate this module into `main()` after other analysis modules. Enhance logging and integration tests to include anomaly detection results, ensuring modularity and testability of the new functionality.

Extend the `ngram_analyzer` module with `analyze_surah_word_ngrams` and `analyze_ayah_word_ngrams` functions to enable word N-gram analysis at Surah and Ayah levels. Update `main()` to incorporate these new functions and enhance logging and integration tests to validate the implementation. This provides a more detailed analysis of word sequence patterns within the Quran at different levels of granularity.

Extend the `ngram_analyzer` module to incorporate character N-gram analysis capabilities. New functions will be added for analyzing character N-grams at the Quran, Surah, and Ayah levels. The `main()` function and integration tests will be updated to include and validate these new functionalities, enhancing the text analysis suite with character-level sequence analysis.

Two new functions, `analyze_first_word_root_frequency_ayah()` and `analyze_last_word_root_frequency_ayah()`, are added to the `frequency_analyzer` module to analyze root word frequency at the first and last positions of Ayahs. The `main()` function is updated to call these new functions, and integration tests are added to validate the new functionalities, enhancing the analytical capabilities of the system.

A new `gematria_analyzer` module is added to the architecture. This module includes functions for calculating Gematria values of words and analyzing the distribution of these values across the Quran. The `main()` function will integrate this new analysis, and integration tests will be updated to validate its functionality. This modular approach ensures organized and testable implementation of Gematria analysis.
